topics.body:
"@Thanotos Omega":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5556657c6368721bd4310e00#post_5556657c6368721bd4310e00
Probably won't happen.

Like Offensive said; the reason why this is happening is that minecraft has a young audience following so more adult reviewers getting merchandise is far less likely.

It's about as likely as say a Pat (from twobestfriends) getting a plushy that every time you squeeze him he says "Don't squeeze my bell you piece of shit!"
